QuestData.Title: The Proper Procedures
QuestData.Description:
I came here to observe the actions of those from Revendreth. However I have been met with news that concerns me.
$p, the attendants tell me that they stored anima in canisters and that anima is being looted, by our own people. That's not how this should be done.
Can I entrust you to retrieve the anima, so I might see it returned to its proper place?
QuestData.RewardText: There's so much anima here. This will be very useful in helping the attendants rebuild. Thank you.
